QUERY_STRING.SELECT: SELECT t.ORG_NUM as orgNum, t.MANAGE_PARENT_ORG as manageParentOrg, t.ORG_FULL_NAME as orgFullName, t.ORG_NAME as orgName, t.ORG_LEVEL as orgLevel, t.COUNTRY_AREA_CD as countryAreaCd, t.ORG_ADDR as orgAddr, t.ORG_ZIP_CD as orgZipCd, t.ORG_TEL as orgTel, t.ACCT_PARENT_ORG as acctParentOrg, t.BELONG_TREAS_CD as belongTreasCd, t.ZONE_CD as zoneCd, t.ORG_ORG_CD as orgOrgCd, t.ORG_LKMAN as orgLkman, t.BIC_CD as bicCd, t.LIQD_CENTER_CD as liqdCenterCd, t.PAYMENT_ORG_NUM as paymentOrgNum, t.CRSPD_DIST_REGION_CD as crspdDistRegionCd, t.CHARGE_REGION_CD as chargeRegionCd, t.INDV_CRDT_ORG_CD as indvCrdtOrgCd, t.CORP_CRDT_ORG_CD as corpCrdtOrgCd, t.CRDT_SYS_ZONE_CD as crdtSysZoneCd, t.INVALID_IND as invalidInd, t.SM_IND as smInd, t.OPEN_DT as openDt, t.ETL_TX_DT as etlTxDt, t.DATA_SRC_TABLE_NAME as dataSrcTableName, t.ETL_JOB_NUM as etlJobNum from T_SYS_CMBC_ORG t
